titleStmt.title: The cooper of Norfolk, or, A true jest o'th' brewer & cooper's wife, and how the cooper served the brewer in his kind to the tune of, The Wiving age, &c.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W.O. for A.M. and sold by the booksellers of Pye-corner and London- Brid[ge],

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Martin Parker. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
In four columns with the title and two woodcuts above the first two; the columns are not separated by rules.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland--Crawford Collections.
